Create a beads issue for this task using `npx bd create`. Include:
- Appropriate priority: -p 1 (urgent), -p 2 (normal), -p 3 (low)
- Type: -t bug|feature|task|epic|chore
- Description: -d "description"
- Dependencies if applicable: --deps "blocks:bd-xxx"

After creating, show the issue ID and suggest next steps.
